column1: #Text=A thoughtful and well written piece by Ms Al-Fattal.
#Text=However, there is one important aspect missing: The lack of shown interest, desire, national pride in Syrians wanting to stay and fight for their country.
#Text=Throughout history, we've seen examples of mass migrations of refugees always with the intent of return to their homeland.
#Text=The Syrian case does not seem to follow this pattern and the one way ticket to Europe/Canada for economic benefit is having adverse effects in creating resentment to their plight.
